titleStmt.title: Qvakers principles quaking, or, Pretended light proved darkness, and perfections found to be greatest imperfections in an answer to a written paper, subscribed with the name of Thomas Holme, and scattered through the country about Liverpool and Lancashire / modestly propounded by Ralph Hall ...
titleStmt.author: Hall, Ralph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. and are to be sold by Edm. Paxton ... and Tho. Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
